title: Rust Serverless Framework - ZAPP
body: ZAPP is a serverless framework made by Rust. Quickly build a scalable GraphQL API web server.

motivation.title: Motivation
motivation.body: The ZAPP project was launched with the goal of reducing software development, operation and maintenance costs.

environment.title: Comfortable Environment
environment.body: Thanks to the efforts of the great open source developers and the evolution of IDEs (Integrated Development Environments) like Visual Studio Code , we have a comfortable development environment.

quickstart.title: Quickstart
quickstart.body: You can build the GraphQL API immediately by installing the required packages for ZAPP.

tutorial.title: Tutorial
tutorial.body: This ZAPP tutorial is designed for those who want to learn by practically developing a mini-application.
